album.title: The Best of Horace Silver, Volume 2

wiki.content:
This piece is considered a classic in the field of crossover jazz, (latin jazz). This tune is often called, when bands or musicians are getting together, to see if you have it together on a musical level. This is a tune everyone should know.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

track.name: Song For My Father
comments: you guys know music ! love ya all!
He formed his own sound. His style of playing and a special spirit of his tunes are recognizable at once.
Mr Cape Verdean, always a treat to listen to.
Cant stay still when listening to this

Ah, a breath of fresh air.......
Just like when my roof comes down.

That's right! I knew I heard this somewhere? So, did Steely Dan do a classic rip?
Picasso did say a good artist barrows and a great artist steals (something to that effect)! Very interesting my dear Watson.
what the fuck is this vocalist shit
